## IModuleInfo interface

Information about a minified module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IModuleInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [extractedComments](./module-minifier-plugin.imoduleinfo.extractedcomments.md) | string\[\] | The extracted comments from this module, e.g. license information for a 3rd party library. |
|  [module](./module-minifier-plugin.imoduleinfo.module.md) | [IExtendedModule](./module-minifier-plugin.iextendedmodule.md) | The raw module object from Webpack, in case information from it is necessary for reconstruction |
|  [source](./module-minifier-plugin.imoduleinfo.source.md) | Source | The (minified) code of this module. Will be a function expression. |
